content: **this pattern will be free for a limited time ** lola hat is a simple classic beanie done in 2x2 rib with a double folded brim and easy decreases to shape the top of the hat sizes s m **head circumference ** 51-54 56-59 cm / 20-21 22-23¼ inches **suggested needles ** 3 5mm us4 16 inches/40cm circular needle and 3 5mm us4 double-pointed needles or suitable needle size to get gauge **gauge ** 20 stitches x 24 row in 2x2 rib k2 p2 on 3 5mm us4 needles = 10x 10 cm or 4x4 inches **yarn ** 100-150 150 g of drops lima 50g = 100m or 109yds held together with 25 25 g of knitting for olive soft silk mohair 25g = 225m or 246yds the white lola hat is knit in drops lima in off white and knitting for olive soft silk mohair in cream
